content.label: The graphics, storyline, interface and puzzles are absolutely top-notch.  Very professionally done.  Can't wait for Journey Down 3, the Underland! :-)

Right up there with the Room, or City of Secrets. This is just a charming game, rich in scenery and personality and with just the right level of challenge to stay entertaining even when you don't know the next steps. 

If you haven't tried the first, definitely go back and get it right away. I've played a LOT of point and click on the iPad and this is one of the best. The faces are styled after African masks, the city is somewhere between New Orleans and Gotham city. I can't wait to see what this studio comes up with next!

This game just keeps giving and giving. I almost never spend money on games and never more than $.99, but after playing TJD1, I wanted to support these designers. Having now played through TJD2, I can definitely say it was money very well spent.
I also am very grateful for protagonists who are not white males. Why is this so hard for other developers to try? That was another reason for my support. Keep up the good work and hurry up with part 3!

Awesome game!  Great graphics and story line!
I can't wait for chapter 3!!!
This is such a great series! Full of mystery and intrigue. Engaging storyline. Great amusing characters. Keeps you coming back for more. Highly recommended!

I liked the direction of one but it was short. I couldn't complain for free but I bought 2 and it was well worth a few days relaxation. I don't know why I like this game instead of waiting doe it to be free like every other. It's just quality and the music is good. Too bad Simon passed :(

I just finished chapter 2 and it was better than chapter 1!!! I can't wait for chapter 3! I hope you have ideas for another game, I'm looking forward to to the next adventure in gaming!
We will all miss Simon.
As for the complaint that it is too mature for children, well there is nothing overtly adult and kids don't understand innuendo as adults do. They just see the adventurer .
Recommend for anyone who loves point and click adventure games.
Cant wait for chapter3. Great point click adventure puzzle!

title.label: Great story, wonderful voices, super music--

content.label:
--plus excellent graphics, plenty of detail, tongue-in-cheek humor, endearing characters--this game has it all. There is one pretty inscrutable puzzle at the end where a hint button would have been helpful.

When you finish there is a nice "behind the scenes" section like the ones on movie CDs.
Love the artwork and music - Thank You for chapter 2!
Download this game, nuff said. Great characters, great story, great voices, great music, great art.

I love point and click games and Journey Down was a good one. Top notch graphics, solid music and characters, fun puzzles. Best of all the story was interesting and intriguing. Hope it's not a long wait for chapter 3.

In over 4 years Ive given only 3 other games 5 stars. This game was done so beautifully with awesome graphics, great soundtrack and exciting storyline I just had to give it 5 stars. Great job on the rainy street!! It was beautifully done.
This game is awesome! Great storyline, detailed graphic, very creative gameplay and I absolutely love the music/character voice acting. Anxiously waiting for the release of the third chapter!
Not usually an adventure game guy, but the music and atmosphere of this game had me hooked.  I also enjoyed the mixture of hand-drawn environments and 3d models.  Definite recommendation.

title.label: Can't wait for chapter 3 to come out!!

content.label: Great story!  This game is loads of fun.
Can't wait for the final chapter!
Worth every penny. A complete and unique experience. The developers are some very talented folk. The amount of detail that went into this game is mind-boggling.

Great game, I didn't want it to end I had to make myself stop playing now and then so I wouldn't play straight thru. I wanted to savor it. The only complaint I have is the amount of time I had to wait for chapter two to be released after chapter one, but I would rather wait to play a quality game than play a rushed (just to get the money) game.  Thanks for making this incredible series. Now hurry up and get chapter three out!!! Ha

title.label: One of the best ios adventures

content.label:
This is an excellent game, as is the first chapter. 

The characters are solid, story is unique, and the puzzles are fun to solve. 

Everything is done with a great quality presentation. 

This is one of the few ios games that kept my attention to finish the story. 

Length of game exceeded my expectation, too. 

Thanks SkyGoblin for a great series!
That was the best click and point adventure game I have ever played in years! Bravo SkyGoblin, bravo! I hope to see chapter 3 real soon!
Much longer than the first and has a great storyline. Really enjoyed this one and can't wait for the final episode!

title.label: Great story and lots of fun

content.label: Amazing details. Not too hard and fun to play.

I immensely enjoyed this game. I was spellbound!
It is rare to find a good game with so many fun elements to keep me glued to it like crazy. It was funny, interesting, and the characters were intriguing. I want to encourage the creators to make many sequels and thank them for allowing Part I to be free. I cannot wait for the next one mon!
Very original storyline and great game. Please make more! =)
Great point and click game.  Chapter 2 took forever to come out, but it was worth the wait.  I just hope the next one doesn't take that long.  I want to find out what happened to Kaunandodo.
Great point and click adventure! Can't wait for next one! Keep up the great work! Similar feeling to monkey island.

title.label: Wish I have a hundred like this

content.label: What can I say. Just a great game. No negatives. I hope there is a chapter 3,4,5 etc.
This game series is outstanding!!  It and it's predecessor are MUST play games.  I cannot wait for the third and final chapter to be released!
Just as fun as the first installment. Let's hope it doesn't take another two years for chapter three!
Loved the first chapter! Second chapter didn't disappoint either! Great game to play to pass time and get lost in figuring out what to do next. Can't wait for the final Chapter!!
Loved the game, the art, the puzzles and the soundtrack!
Already desperate for the next chapter. A must buy.

Journey Down has a terrific story line and a point-and-click adventure that keeps you engaged. After the amazing first chapter, I plunked down full price for #2 to support the developers. Well worth it, though I think this is a smidgeon not quite as good.

Be aware that the faces of the characters are very stylized, based on African(?) masks.  I thought in the first chapter it was fine (Bwana, Lina, etc look lovely.) In the 2nd chapter it often looks creepy. Barlow looks monstrous. My young kids played the first but the second seems more mature (the initial encounter with the sultry woman, the women who I think are prostitutes, the innuendoes between Barlow and Lina).

Improvements that would be appreciated:
- graphics could be a little brighter, especially in the harbor scene before Morton's lighthouse. It is black on my screen. I can't even see Bwana.
- shorten dialogue after first repetition or let a single tap end the conversation This game is sometimes very wordy.
- a notebook to remind us of our goals. After a day, I can't immediately recall what I am doing or where I found the whatever
- a help system (obscure is ok but I am so stuck right now)

It's so rare to find such well-produced games in the App Store anymore. This sequel is as good as the first and leaves you wanting more! (Hey, that rhymes!) Similar to Monkey Island 3D except with better controls and without the lagging animation problems. Made me sad to see the memorial dedication at the end--RIP Simon. Great game.

I admit I have a problem with my own patience when it comes to point and click games ...I delete most of them after the first 5 minutes of play but this series fits in my "sweet spot" of just enough dialogue to keep the back story going while letting me jump in and start exploring. It's fun and funny. I just have to be patient while I anxiously await the third episode. I miss bwana and kits already!!!
Loved Chapter 2.  Can't wait for Chapter3!
Awesome game, waiting for Chapter 3.  Good job  SkyGoblin!
Beautiful, with clever puzzles, amusing characters and a fun story.  Well worth the purchase--I already can't wait for the next installment.
Loved part 2 can't wait for part 3.  Great sound, graphics and storyline.
